content: i created this design to match my hanover hammock i loved the beaded overhang so much i had to use it again you will find you want to display this beauty instead of hiding it away in your pantry supplies needed -approx 130-140 yds of worsted weight size 4 cotton -a size h 5 0 mm hook or size needed to obtain gauge -7 10 or 12 mm wooden beads -1 medium sized hair elastic -measuring tape scissors terminology used and abbreviations pattern is written in us terminology back loop only - blo beginning - beg chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet fasten_off - fo front loop only - flo right side - rs single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch es - slip_stitch s stitch es - st s space s - space s wrong side - ws gauge 5 row of gauge pattern = 3 5 x 4 5 9 x 11 4 cm you can also find this pattern on my blog at daysck com **there are no refunds for the purchase of my digital patterns my patterns have been tested and edited accordingly however there may still be some lingering errors as i am human if you encounter an error please notify me and i will be happy to make the suggested edits and send you the corrected copy if necessary **
